title: Grey's Anatomy star Jesse Williams cozies up to girlfriend Taylour Paige at The Irishman LA premiere
text:
He went public with his new romance back in May.

And on Thursday night, Jesse Williams was all smiles as he brought Taylour Paige along with him to the LA premiere for Netflix's The Irishman.

The Grey's Anatomy star, 38, posed for photos with his arm around the waist of the 29-year-old actress and dancer.

Date: Grey's Anatomy star Jesse Williams was all smiles as he brought his new girlfriend Taylour Paige along with him to the LA premiere for Netflix's The Irishman on Thursday night

Paige wore a full-length pink satin slip dress cinched at the waist with a narrow belt.

She stepped out in sandal heels and wore her chin-length bob sleekly styled.

Williams opted for a dark blue two-piece suit.

He wore the jacket undone over a black buttoned-up shirt and added bling with a statement gold necklace.

Couple: Paige wore a full-length pink satin slip dress cinched at the waist with a narrow belt. Williams opted for a dark blue two-piece suit with a black buttoned-up shirt and gold necklace

Several months strong: The actor, 38, and the 29-year-old actress and dancer were first linked in January when they were spotted together at the Sundance Film Festival in Utah

Legal woes: Williams filed for divorce from longtime love Aryn Drake-Lee in April 2017. The exes, who share two young children, are locked in a court battle over spousal and child support

The couple were first linked in January when they were spotted together at the Sundance Film Festival in Utah.

Williams, who has portrayed Dr. Jackson Avery on Grey's Anatomy since 2009, is still in the middle of a messy divorce from longtime love Aryn Drake-Lee with whom he shares two young children.

The actor filed for divorce in April 2017 but the exes are still arguing over spousal support and child support payments for their daughter Sadie, five, and son Maceo, four.
description: The actor, 38, posed for photos with his arm around the waist of the 29-year-old actress and dancer who wore a full-length pink slip dress.
